node: HIV-Positive Patient with Suspected CNS INFECTION
content: Algorithm for diagnosing and managing CNS infections in HIV-positive patients

children.content: History, physical and detailed-neurologic examination

children.node: Focal signs, seizures, altered mental status
children.content: Patient presents with focal neurological signs, seizures, or altered mental status
Perform a CT scan to assess for lesions
CT scan reveals a lesion
Mass effect
Administer empiric steroids

children.node: Positive Toxoplasma serology, not receiving Toxoplasma prophylaxis
children.content: Patient has positive Toxoplasma serology and is not receiving prophylaxis
Empiric Toxoplasma therapy
No improvement after 10-14 days of empiric therapy
Consider performing a brain biopsy to determine the cause
